home-assistant-addon/create-a-document.description: Documents are groups of pages connected through:

home-assistant-addon/create-a-page.description: Add Markdown or React files to src/pages to create a standalone page:

home-assistant-addon/deploy-your-site.title: Deploy your site
home-assistant-addon/deploy-your-site.description: Docusaurus is a static-site-generator (also called Jamstack).

home-assistant-addon/markdown-features.title: Markdown Features
home-assistant-addon/markdown-features.description: Docusaurus supports Markdown and a few additional features.
